item.title: In a cold night with yellow light
item.dc:creator: PosiMYthGutEnBeRG
item.content:encoded: The technology, there is real merit to it. I do think, though, it will be years down the road before we see the kind of ubiquity and acceptance that make it a form of currency that is used every day.”
item.excerpt:encoded: Content is the reason search began in the first place. Also, Content is anything that adds value to the reader’s life. This space is now yours, Use it wisely.

item.title: Smile Smile and Keep on smiling
item.dc:creator: PosiMYthGutEnBeRG
item.content:encoded: The technology, there is real merit to it. I do think, though, it will be years down the road before we see the kind of ubiquity and acceptance that make it a form of currency that is used every day.”
item.excerpt:encoded: A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine.

item.title: Nobody can stop you, When you walk
item.dc:creator: PosiMYthGutEnBeRG
item.content:encoded: The technology, there is real merit to it. I do think, though, it will be years down the road before we see the kind of ubiquity and acceptance that make it a form of currency that is used every day.”
item.excerpt:encoded: A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine.

item.title: Stunned with scenery and silence of location
item.dc:creator: PosiMYthGutEnBeRG
item.content:encoded: The technology, there is real merit to it. I do think, though, it will be years down the road before we see the kind of ubiquity and acceptance that make it a form of currency that is used every day.”
item.excerpt:encoded: Content is the reason search began in the first place. Also, Content is anything that adds value to the reader’s life. This space is now yours, Use it wisely.

item.title: Life is full of clouds but focus on visibility
item.dc:creator: PosiMYthGutEnBeRG
item.content:encoded: The technology, there is real merit to it. I do think, though, it will be years down the road before we see the kind of ubiquity and acceptance that make it a form of currency that is used every day.”
item.excerpt:encoded: A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine.
